name: The Fool
description: Upright: New beginnings, optimism, leap of faith. Reversed: Recklessness, risk-taking, holding back.

name: The Magician
description: Upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power. Reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents.

name: The High Priestess
description: Upright: Intuition, subconscious, mystery. Reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal.

name: The Empress
description: Upright: Abundance, femininity, nature. Reversed: Creative block, dependence, smothering.

name: The Emperor
description: Upright: Authority, structure, protection. Reversed: Tyranny, rigidity, lack of discipline.

name: The Hierophant
description: Upright: Tradition, spiritual wisdom, conformity. Reversed: Rebellion, personal beliefs, non-conformity.

name: The Lovers
description: Upright: Harmony, relationships, choices. Reversed: Disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values.

name: The Chariot
description: Upright: Victory, willpower, discipline. Reversed: Lack of direction, aggression, loss of control.
